column5: Tourism;PHNOM PENH – The Ministry of Health announced on the early morning of March 14
column6: 2020 that it will ban foreign nationals traveling from Italy
column9: France and the United States from entering the country for 30 days.------This will take effect from 17 March onwards. This decision is a measure to prevent the spread of the COVID-19.------UPDATE: Phnom Penh (Fresh News)
column10: Mar. 14 –------ C------ambodia‘s Ministry of Foreign Affairs issued a letter on 14 March informing Cambodian ambassadors and consuls to suspend visas of foreigners from Italy
column14: and the United States for 30 days to prevent Covid-19.------The visa suspension will be effective from 17 March 2020.------Visas granted will be canceled and reimbursed
column15: according to the letter signed by Secretary of State Ouch Borith.------EDIT: It is now uncertain whether other travelers from these countries will be barred from entering
column16: or just the nationalities mentioned. More details will be released later.
